channel.title: Docker on Linuxkai 的博客
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Linuxkai 的博客

item.title: docker-compose 修改容器时区
item.description: docker-compose 修改容器时区 方法1 environment: TZ: Asia/Shanghai 或者 environment: - TZ: Asia/Shanghai 方法2 environment: - SET_CONTAINER_TIMEZONE=true - CONTAINER_TIMEZONE=Asia/Shanghai #或者这样写 environment: SET_CONTAINER_TIMEZONE: true CONTAINER_TIMEZONE: Asia/Shanghai
